name: Mayank Priyadarshi
about: Experienced Member with a demonstrated history of working in the non-profit organization management industry. Skilled in Hockey, Microsoft Word, SolidWorks, Leadership, and Microsoft Excel. Strong operations professional with a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) + Master of Technology (M.Tech) in Engineering Entrepreneurship focused in Agricultural and Food Engineering / Engineering Entrepreneurship from Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur.

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience.description: Project: Hadith Classificationâ€¢ Analysed and Classified English and Arabic Hadith Data Corpus using various NLP methods and toolkits like NLTK, Farasi API, CaMel, etc.â€¢ Trained and tested self-developed SVM model and used it with a pre-trained, multilingual BERT model with 90.8% classification accuracy.â€¢ Deployed the models using AWS Lambda functions and other AWS infrastructures with a user feedback system using AWS Cognito
experience.description_html: Project: Hadith Classificationâ€¢ Analysed and Classified English and Arabic Hadith Data Corpus using various NLP methods and toolkits like NLTK, Farasi API, CaMel, etc.â€¢ Trained and tested self-developed SVM model and used it with a pre-trained, multilingual BERT model with 90.8% classification accuracy.â€¢ Deployed the models using AWS Lambda functions and other AWS infrastructures with a user feedback system using AWS Cognito <!---->

positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: â€¢ Spearheaded the conduction of 30 nationwide competitions, 9 workshops by industrial pioneers 6 eminent guest lecturesâ€¢ Headed a 4-tier team comprising of 12 Heads, 23 Members, 44 Campus Affiliates, and 180 Volunteers for smooth conduction of the festâ€¢ Coordinated all facets of the fest spanning sponsorship, events, finance; managed a total budget of INR 5.6 millionâ€¢ Introduced new structure of regionals across India, resulting in a substantial increase in the number of participants by 10 times
positions.title: Executive Head
positions.description_html:
â€¢ Spearheaded the conduction of 30 nationwide competitions, 9 workshops by industrial pioneers 6 eminent guest lectures
â€¢ Headed a 4-tier team comprising of 12 Heads, 23 Members, 44 Campus Affiliates, and 180 Volunteers for smooth conduction of the fest
â€¢ Coordinated all facets of the fest spanning sponsorship, events, finance; managed a total budget of INR 5.6 million
â€¢ Introduced new structure of regionals across India, resulting in a substantial increase in the number of participants by 10 times

positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: â€¢ Coordinated with a team of 23 members to organize the 17th edition of Kshitij, the annual techno-management symposium of IIT Kharagpurâ€¢ Raised a total amount of over INR 5,50,000 through corporate sponsorship and alumni funding from the region of Delhi and Kolkataâ€¢ Responsible for organizing automobile exhibition of cars and bikes of premium companies like Triumph, Jeep, Harley Davidson, Kia etc.â€¢ Conducted prelims of events with an increase in participation by more than 400% in 4 prominent places of Bihar and Jharkhandâ€¢ Oversaw the publicity of symposium in the region of Bihar, Jharkhand and Odisha and increased the participation by 350% from the regionâ€¢ Conducted robotics workshop along with team members in Kolkata with the participation of 850 students from different collegesâ€¢ Executed the hospitality and transportation of 165 guests and more than 4000 participants during three days of the symposiumâ€¢ Led team of 43 campus affiliate for inside campus management and the team of 24 campus ambassador from various colleges for publicity of fest
positions.title: Core Organising Team Member
positions.description_html:
â€¢ Coordinated with a team of 23 members to organize the 17th edition of Kshitij, the annual techno-management symposium of IIT Kharagpur
â€¢ Raised a total amount of over INR 5,50,000 through corporate sponsorship and alumni funding from the region of Delhi and Kolkata
â€¢ Responsible for organizing automobile exhibition of cars and bikes of premium companies like Triumph, Jeep, Harley Davidson, Kia etc.
â€¢ Conducted prelims of events with an increase in participation by more than 400% in 4 prominent places of Bihar and Jharkhand
â€¢ Oversaw the publicity of symposium in the region of Bihar, Jharkhand and Odisha and increased the participation by 350% from the region
â€¢ Conducted robotics workshop along with team members in Kolkata with the participation of 850 students from different colleges
â€¢ Executed the hospitality and transportation of 165 guests and more than 4000 participants during three days of the symposium
â€¢ Led team of 43 campus affiliate for inside campus management and the team of 24 campus ambassador from various colleges for publicity of fest
